pages.text: Grizzly Bears are defensive mobs that spawns in Forests Biomes of the Overworld. They will attack players if they get too close or attack them.$(br2)They can be tamed. The player must first feed it a honeycomb by dropping it on the ground. Then the player will have to fed it with a raw salmon, by throwing it on the ground, each salmon the bear consumes has a 30% change to tame.
These animals can sometimes be seen rummanging throught bee nests to find honeycomb for consumption.

Tamed Grizzly Bears can be made to sit, wander or follow.$(br2)They can be ridden without the need of a Saddle but they are slow and cannot jump.$(br2)Grizzly bears will defend its owner from attackers such as hostile mobs and players, they even can attack while their owner is riding them.
